languages.text: "Какое щедрое предложение! Пожалуй, я отвечу на него так..." {n}Вокс дрожит от низкого гула.{/n} "Слышишь? Это лэнс-излучатель "Бессердечного". Попробуй вести переговоры с ним".
"What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."
languages.original_text: "Какое щедрое предложение! Пожалуй, я отвечу на него так..." {n}Вокс дрожит от низкого гула.{/n} "Слышишь? Это лэнс-излучатель "Бессердечного". Попробуй вести переговоры с ним".

traits.locale_text: "What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the lance weapon on the Heartless. I invite you to parley with it."
"What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the lance weapon on the Heartless. I invite you to parley with it."
"What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."
"What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."
"What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."
"What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."

languages.text: «¡Qué propuesta tan magnánima! Creo que mi respuesta será...». {n}El voco empieza a emitir un zumbido grave.{/n} «¿Lo oyes? Es el arma de lanza de la Desalmada. Te invito a parlamentar con ella».
languages.original_text: "What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué propuesta tan magnánima! Creo que mi respuesta será...». {n}El voco empieza a emitir un zumbido grave.{/n} «¿Lo oyes? Es el arma de lanza de la Desalmada. Te invito a parlamentar con ella».

languages.text: “何等慷慨的提议！既然如此，我的回答是……”{n}音阵装置里传来了低沉的嗡鸣声。{/n}“听到了吗？那是无心号光矛武器的声音，我邀请你和它好好谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."

traits.locale_text: “何等慷慨的提议！既然如此，我的回答是……”{n}音阵装置里传来了低沉的嗡鸣声。{/n}“听到了吗？那是无心号光矛武器的声音，我邀请你和它好好谈谈。”

languages.text: « En voilà une offre généreuse ! Un instant, que je réfléchisse... » {n}Un vrombissement sourd s'élève du vox.{/n} « Vous entendez ? C'est la lance du Sans-Cœur. Parlementez plutôt avec elle. »
languages.original_text: "What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."

traits.locale_text: « En voilà une offre généreuse ! Un instant, que je réfléchisse... » {n}Un vrombissement sourd s'élève du vox.{/n} « Vous entendez ? C'est la lance du Sans-Cœur. Parlementez plutôt avec elle. »

languages.text: 「なんと気前の良い提案だ！私の回答は…」{n}低音なブーンという音がヴォックスから鳴る。{/n}「聞こえるか？あれはハートレスのランスウェポンだよ。それでお前と交渉しようと思う」
languages.original_text: "What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."

traits.locale_text: 「なんと気前の良い提案だ！私の回答は…」{n}低音なブーンという音がヴォックスから鳴る。{/n}「聞こえるか？あれはハートレスのランスウェポンだよ。それでお前と交渉しようと思う」

languages.text: "Şu teklifin cömertliğine bak! Cevabım..." {n}Vokstan alçak bir uğultu yükseliyor.{/n} "Duydun mu? Taşkalp'in mızrak silahının sesi. Müzakerede beni o temsil edecek."
languages.original_text: "What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."

traits.locale_text: "Şu teklifin cömertliğine bak! Cevabım..." {n}Vokstan alçak bir uğultu yükseliyor.{/n} "Duydun mu? Taşkalp'in mızrak silahının sesi. Müzakerede beni o temsil edecek."

languages.text: "Was für ein großzügiger Vorschlag! Ich denke, meine Antwort lautet ..." {n}Aus dem Vox ertönt ein tiefes Summen.{/n} "Könnt Ihr das hören? Das ist die Lanzenwaffe der Heartless. Ihr könnt Euch gerne mit ihr unterhalten."
languages.original_text: "What a generous proposal! I think my response will be..." {n}A low hum rises out of the vox.{/n} "Can you hear it? That's the Heartless's lance weapon. I invite you to parley with it."
